what_is_section.h2: What Is Tankless Water Heater Installation?

This is especially beneficial in Newport Beach, CA where hard water can cause traditional tank-style water heaters to work harder and reduce their lifespan. Tankless water heaters are also more energy-efficient and can last up to 15-20 years, compared to 8-12 years for traditional tank-style water heaters.
